title: A teen’s mural included video game fan art. Parents called it satanic.
description: A teenager wanted to make people feel welcome. But parents decried her art, which included LGBTQ pride flags and doodles of cartoon characters, as satanic.

title: ‘God of War Ragnarok’ looks and performs beautifully on PlayStation 4
description: “Ragnarok” on the PlayStation 4 is barely compromised and highly optimized.

title: ‘Pokémon Scarlet’ offers a new twist on the franchise: freak sandwiches
description: I made a pickle, avocado, whipped cream, cream cheese, bacon, ham and potato tortilla sandwich in "Pokémon Scarlet." My Pokémon loved it.

title: ‘Ragnarok’s’ opening hours point to a safe God of War sequel
description: "God of War Ragnarok" is a sequel in the best and worst ways.

title: Why G4 failed
description: Constant pivots, high costs and controversy bedeviled the directionless network in the lead-up to its collapse.

title: Remote work changed their lives. They’re not going back to the office.
description: Workers for companies including Airbnb, Spotify and Block say their new remote policies led them to travel and connect with family — but with new challenges.

title: There’s a new tool to help blow up asteroids
description: Researchers from MIT and Stanford have created a tool that could improve the aim of future planetary defense missions.

title: Sorry you went viral
description: TikTok’s explosive stardom has created a new kind of celebrity. But nothing goes viral like rage.
